title: RADS ERROR FIX
body:
Just thought people should know how to fix the RADS error Below VVVV
1. Right click on your connection icon in the bottom right of your screen.
2. Go to the network centre. 
3. Go to the adapter settings thingie.
4. Search your connection.
5. Right click -> properties.
6. Search Internet protocol version 4.
7. Right click -> properties.
8. Change your DNS servers to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one).ï»¿
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b_OeC67ePCU

replies.body: [Riot have these as official instructions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4), along with the ability to choose whether you're on Mac or Windows. This isn't the ultimate RADS error fix, as there could possibly be many other things affecting your connection. This was just one that was causing a lot of problems recently.
